title: ale
name: Pale
flavor: A pale ale with pronounced hop flavor.

title: ale
name: IPA
flavor: A pale ale with pronounced hop flavor and caramel or nutty malt.

title: ale
name: Bitter
flavor: A pale ale with medium to high bitterness.

title: ale
name: Amber/Red
flavor: An amber/red ale with medium to high hop and toasted malt flavors.

title: ale
name: Scottish & Irish
flavor: A strong ale with rich malty flavors and aromas.

title: ale
name: Barley Wine
flavor: A strong ale with intensely malty caramel flavors and bitter hops .

title: ale
name: Old Ale
flavor: A strong ale with sweet nutty malt and fruit flavors.

title: ale
name: Brown
flavor: A dark ale with toasted with nutty malt flavor and little hop.

title: ale
name: Porter
flavor: A dark ale with roasted malt taste and light to firm hops.

title: ale
name: Stout
flavor: A dark ale with roasted taste, low sweetness and high bitterness.

title: wheat
name: Hefeweizen
flavor: A wheat ale with very low hop, more wheat flavor.

title: lager
name: Light
glass: Becker pint glass or mug/Seidel glass
flavor: A light lager with very little hop, bitterness or flavor.

title: lager
name: Pilsner
flavor: A pilsner lager with medium to high hop bitterness.

title: lager
name: Amber
glass: Mug/Seidel glass or a pint glass
flavor: An amber lager with sweet to mild malt flavor and medium hop bitterness.

title: lager
name: Bock
glass: Stange glass or Tom Collins glass
flavor: A strong lager with rich malty flavor.

title: lager
name: Dark
flavor: A dark lager with malt flavor throughout, moderately sweet.
